events.description: The European Central Bank kept interest rates unchanged at its first policy meeting of 2026.

facts.fact_text: Germany’s 10-year Bund yield slipped to around 2.85%

evidences.evidence_text: Germany’s 10-year Bund yield slipped to around 2.85%

facts.fact_text: The ECB kept interest rates unchanged at its first policy meeting of 2026.

evidences.evidence_text: the European Central Bank kept interest rates unchanged at its first policy meeting of 2026

facts.fact_text: Headline inflation slowed to 1.7% year on year in January.

evidences.evidence_text: headline inflation slowed to 1.7% year on year in January

facts.fact_text: Core inflation eased to 2.2%, its weakest level since October 2021.

evidences.evidence_text: core inflation eased to 2.2%, slightly below forecasts and its weakest level since October 2021.

claims.claim_text: The ECB reaffirmed that inflation should converge toward its 2% target over the medium term.
claims.author: ECB

evidences.evidence_text: and reaffirmed that inflation should converge toward its 2% target over the medium term.

claims.claim_text: The euro area economy remains resilient, but the outlook is clouded by global trade policy uncertainty and ongoing geopolitical tensions.
claims.author: ECB

evidences.evidence_text: The ECB said the euro area economy remains resilient, but warned that the outlook is clouded by global trade policy uncertainty and ongoing geopolitical tensions.

claims.claim_text: Some officials have cautioned that further euro appreciation could reopen the debate on rate cuts.
claims.author: ECB officials

evidences.evidence_text: although some officials have cautioned that further euro appreciation could reopen the debate on rate cuts.

evidence.evidence_text: European Central Bank kept interest rates unchanged
and reaffirmed that inflation should converge toward its 2% target over the medium term.
The ECB said the euro area economy remains resilient
the outlook is clouded by global trade policy uncertainty and ongoing geopolitical tensions.
headline inflation slowed to 1.7% year on year in January
core inflation eased to 2.2%, slightly below forecasts and its weakest level since October 2021.
